name: alb-ecs-fargate-api
description: This is an implementation of an API in RUST following this schema:

scripts.tf:apply: cd infra && dotenv -- terraform apply -var="account_id=$AWS_ACCOUNT_ID" -var="region=$REGION" && cd ..
scripts.tf:destroy: cd infra && dotenv -- terraform destroy -var="account_id=$AWS_ACCOUNT_ID" -var="region=$REGION" && cd ..
